content: **knitted jumper in drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked top down with round yoke lace pattern and short sleeves sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern as-188 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 125-150-150-175-200-200 g colour 27 rainforest dew **needles** drops circular needles size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 24 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
